name: Kill My Friends
description:
So I went ahead and made a video game where you can do cool parkour and stuff and decided to ruin it by adding a bunch of enemies that use some sound effects from my friends.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Jump

Shift - Slide

Mouse - Look/Shoot

Escape - Pause

Control - Walk (Very Pointless)

(As a side note, the game is controller compatible besides in menus)

Music is by DJ CactusJuice, Song can be found here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sMXCP_VDefU
